file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server"
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server"
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server"

FastPattern.description: Trend Micro protects against a new spyware application (version 7)
FastPattern.matcher:
<\S+\s+[^>]*account="([^"]*)"[^>]*computer="([^"]*)"[^>]*eventId="([^"]*)"[^>]*source="([^"]*)"[^>]*timeGenerated="([^"]*)"[^>]*>[\s
]*<String1>[\s
]*(Trend Micro protects against a new spyware application)[\s
]*</String1>.*
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server"
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User \S+ logged off
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User \S+ logged off
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User \S+ logged in

FastPattern.description: Virus/Malware Detected (Version 8,9) no comma or parens
FastPattern.pattern: source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server"
source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server"
source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server"
source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server"
source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server"

FastPattern.description: PolicyModify: 10, User added, assigned, copied, deleted, edited, modified, moved
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully (?:added|assigned|copied|deleted|edited|modified|moved) [-()/\w ]+\.

FastPattern.description: PolicyModify: 10, User removed, renamed, save, update
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully (?:removed|renamed|save|update) [-()/\w ]+\.
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully get \w+ table\.

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User started connection verification task
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully started a connection verification task\.

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User notified client of uninstallation
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully notified client of the uninstallation task\.

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User successfully started the assessment
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully started the assessment of compliance report

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User successfully notify selected clients to perform update
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully notify (?:selected)? *clients to perform update

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User successfully saved and started synchronizing AD
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully saved and started synchronizing the Active Directory scope

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User successfully started a remote installation task for computer
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully started a remote installation task for computer "[\d.]+"
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" (?:modifies|adds) role "[^"]+" successfully

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User successfully notified clients to send firewall logs
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully notified clients to send firewall logs
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully (?:register|unregister) control manager
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" adds account "[^"]+" successfully
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully saved the Active Directory scope
eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" removes account "[^"]+" successfully

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User successfully {exported, imported} the policy
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully (?:ex|im)ported the policy

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User successfully rollback the smart scan agent pattern of clients
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully rollback the smart scan agent pattern of(?: server and)? clients

FastPattern.matcher: <\S+\s+[^>]*account="([^"]*)"[^>]*computer="([^"]*)"[^>]*eventId="([^"]*)"[^>]*source="([^"]*)"[^>]*timeGenerated="([^"]*)"[^>]*>[^<]*<String1>.*callback detected Compromised Host: (\S*) IP Address: ([-/\w.]*) Domain: ([-\\\w. ]*) (Date/Time: [:/\d ]+) Callback address: (\S+).*?risk level: (\S+).*? source: (.*) Action: (\S+)\s*</String1>.*
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="800".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*callback detected
eventId="800".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*Digital asset transmission detected
eventId="700".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*Number of viruses/malware: \d+ Number of computers: \d+

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User successfully do a server manual update
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully do a server manual update

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: 10, User successfully add the update source
FastPattern.pattern: eventId="10".*source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server".*User "\S+" successfully add the update source
source="Trend Micro (?:OfficeScan|Security) Server"
